page.title: 12EDUCATION: A CHILDS VIEW
page.content: In the Infants school we enjoyed ourselves very much. The work was quite simple. In Maths we did simple addition and subtraction but it was hard to us. In English we learnt about how to add different endings onto words which we had learnt in the second year Infants. At the end of the third year Infants we were all reading well and ready for our first year Junior Class. This was quite a change for us, as we needed our own writing equipment but still wrote in pencil and did printing. We got our first computer whilst we were in this class. The years throughout the Juniors went very quickly and before we knew it, it was the end of Primary School.In High School we will do subjects like languages, and all the children are looking forward to going there in 1985.
